message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe could be of great value to you. I'm asking for $1500000 for it. This is a firm price, but I'm open to discussing the details and the potential benefits of this product further. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for offering the unique product. I understand its value, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1400000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1400000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little to $1450000, recognizing the value you see in this product. This is a fair price that balances our needs. Let me know if you're able to accept this revised offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $1425000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
